FAQ / Wave 2 / Battle Cards /
View On FortressMaximus.io

Energized Field

  1. If I flip two orange battle icons, does it deal 2 damage? [Source: WotC]
    No. The ability does a maximum of 1 damage, no matter how many orange battle icons you flip.
  2. If Overheat is revealed, do effects like Energized Field’s still work? [Source: WotC]
    Yes. With Overheat, orange battle icons don’t add to the attack value, but they were still flipped, so any other effects that care about flipping orange battle icons will still work. The same is true for black battle icons.
  3. My question is the following scenario:
    Player A has one bot remaining with 1 health
    Player B has one bot remaining with 3 health
    Player A attacks with his one remaining bot into Player B's bot that has Energized Field equipped.
    Player A's total attack value after flipping all cards (attack and defense flips) is enough to kill Player B's bot BUT during the defense card flips Player B flips a single orange card thus triggering Energized Field’s ability.
    What would be the order of operations?     [Source: WotC]
    Energized Field’s ability would trigger before damage is dealt, KO’ing Player A’s last character and winning the game for Player B.
